price: Cuando los dos grupos se divisaron, los seguidores de Moisés exclamaron: "¡[Pronto] seremos alcanzados!"
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
